segments.text: Could I speak to the apartment manager ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am the apartment manager . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wanted to know if that apartment on Main Street is still for rent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't rented it out yet . Would you like to see it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I want to see it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about today at 6 p . m . ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That time is okay with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . We'll meet at 6 . Do you need directions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you . I go by there on my way to work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you're interested , you can fill out an application form .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . Do I need to bring anything myself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . The only thing I need to see is your driver's license .
segments.speaker: S2
